title: Epigenetic and transcriptomic alterations precede amyloidosis in the Alzheimer's disease App
abstract: Understanding Alzheimer's disease (AD) from its earliest stages is essential for uncovering initial mechanisms of pathology and developing interventions. Here, we use the humanized App
